//

    console.log(msg);

.,methods.

</template>

API.setup(),ref()(refxxx.value).(?)

    import { ref } from 'vue';
    const count = ref(0);
</script>
<template>
    <button @click="count++">{{count}}</button>
</template>

defineProps() & defineEmits()

propsemits,,defineProps()defineEmits()API.,.(?)

vue
<script setup lang='ts'>
  const props = defineProps({
    foo:String
  });
  const emit = defineEmits(['change','delete']);
</script>
  • definePropsdefineEmitsAPI(compiler macros),<script setup>.,<script setup>(compiled away).
  • definePropsprops,defineEmitsemits.
  • definePropsdefineEmits,.
  • API,setup(). setup.API,. ,.

(Type-only)props/emit

PropsEmits,.(literal type argument).

ts
const props = defineProps<{
    foo:string;
    bar?:number;
}>();

const emit = defineEmits<{
    (e:'change',id:number):void
    (e:'update',value:string):void
}>{}

// 3.3+,
const emit = defineEmits<{
    change:[id:number],
    update:[value:string]
}>()

TIP

$emit,,///.()

  • definePropsdefineEmits:(),**,**(Typescript)..
  • ,,"",.
    • ,.foo:String,foo:string.,foo:null(any),.
    • ,,.(props`['foo','bar'])
  • Vue3.2,defineProps,.

    console.log(foo);

:

watchEffect(() => {
    console.log(props.foo);
});

(?,props.?)

JS,props.props.

interface Props {
    msg?:string;
    labels?:string[]
}
const { msg = 'hello', labels=['one','two']} = defineProps<Props>();

props

,3.5,props.API,APIwithDefault(),(compiler macro).

ts
interface Props{
    msg?:string;
    labels?:string[]
}
const props = withDefault(defineProps<Props>(),{
    msg:'hello',
    labels:() => ['one','two'],
});  // labels.Pinia State..

defineModel()

  • v3.4+

,prop,v-model.(?)v-model.
,propprop.,prop;propmodelValue.,propmodel ref(prop's options and model ref's value transform options)

js
const model = defineModel(); // ,prop`modelValue`

const model = defineModel({type:String}); // `modelValue`prop,String.(prop's options)

model.value = 'hello'; // (emits)"update: modelValue"

const count = defineModel('count');  // countprop,`v-model:count`

const count =defineModel('count',{ type: Number, default:0}); // .

function inc(){
    count.value++; // ,`update:count`.(v-model,)
}

WARNING

defineModelprop,,(de-synchronization).
,myRefundefined,model1.

js
//
const model = defineModel({default:1});
// 
const myRef = ref();
<Child v-model="myRef" />     // ??? ?

v-model,defineModel():

js
const [modelValue, modelModifiers] = defineModel();
// v-model.trim()
if(modelModifiers.trim){
    //...
}

v-model,.(?)getset:

js
const [modelValue, modelModifiers] = defineModel({
    // `get()`,
    set(value){
        if(modelModifiers.trim){
            return modelValue.trim();
        }
        return value;
    }
})

Typescript

definePropsdefineEmits,defineModel,:

ts
const modelValue = defineModel<string>();

const modelValue = defineModel<string>({reqruied:true});

const [modelValue,modelModifiers] = defineModel<string,'trim' | 'uppercase'>();
// 'trim''uppercase'

ref,vue-component-type-helpers,InstanceType.

vue

import componentWithoutGenerics from '../component-without-generics.vue';
import genericComponent from '../generic-component.vue';

import type { ComponentExposed } from 'vue-component-type-helpers';

ref<InstanceType<typeof componentWithoutGenerics>>(); // 
ref<ComponentExposed<typeof genericComponent>>() // ComponentExposed
</script>
